quotes.quote: There's only one corner of the universe you can be certain of improving, and that's your own self.
We make a living by what we get, but we make a life by what we give.
Life's burdens are lighter when I laugh at myself.
We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence then, is not an act, but a habit.
In the end, it's not going to matter how many breaths you took, but how many moments took your breath away.
The great man is he who does not lose his child's heart.
Dream as if you'll live forever, live as if you'll die today.
Don't be seduced into thinking that that which does not make profit is without value.
The optimist sees the rose and not its thorns; the pessimist stares at the thorns, oblivious to the rose.
Do not take life too seriously. You will never get out of it alive.
The thinking that got us to where we are is not the thinking that will get us to where we want to be.
Better to do something imperfectly than to do nothing flawlessly.
Tell me and I will forget. Show me and I will remember. Involve me and I will understand.
Promise me you'll always remember: You're braver than you believe, and stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think.
Work like you don't need the money, love like you've never been hurt and dance like no one is watching
And in the end, it's not the years in your life that count. It's the life in your years.
Blessed is he who expects nothing, for he shall never be disappointed.
In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.
An eye for eye only ends up making the whole world blind.
Life can only be understood backwards; but it must be lived forwards.
Courage doesn't always roar. Sometimes courage is the quiet voice at the end of the day saying, â€œI will try again tomorrow.
Nobody can go back and start a new beginning, but anyone can start today and make a new ending.
Everything has beauty, but not everyone sees it.
I walk slowly, but I never walk backward.
Don't be afraid your life will end; be afraid that it will never begin.
A tree is known by its fruit; a man by his deeds. A good deed is never lost; he who sows courtesy reaps friendship, and he who plants kindness gathers love.
If you don't like something, change it. If you can't change it, change your attitude.
Where there is love there is life.
You are not a product of your circumstances but a product of your decisions
Be kind, for everyone you meet is fighting a hard battle.
